column1: event,"Hi all! I know it's been a long while since I have updated this thing. As some of you may or may not know, my health has taken a pretty bad turn for the worse and I have to sell my stuff from my private collection. Please take a look at some of the stuff I have to offer.

I'm taking offers on everything. Sailor Moon manga, artbooks, anime guides, plush artemis, Utena, Evangelion, Lolita clothing, cosplay hats and more!  My health is preventing me from being able to price things and list them separately so I'm sorry for the crude display.  Please comment with any questions.
Alos with my health, I can only ship about once a week. I'll keep it posted the       next     tine I'll make a postal run."
<big><strong>Here are all the Sailor Moon goodies I have to offer.  Please have a look!  Comment with any questions and with you zip code so I can calculate shipping :)

column1: event,"<bold><strong>I want to make sure everything goes well, I know I'm not perfect.  Please leave a comment when you recieve something and let me know if your satisfied.  I will not delete comments in here so come to check what other people think of me!
*proof already I'm not perfect, to anybody whose comment replies were frozen, I'm sorry!  I think it's fixed now  ::sweatdrop::
Anime DVD, VHS, CD and Video Games
<bold><strong>Here is a list of things I am looking for!&nbsp
column2: Please help me out if you can :)

column1: Sailor Moon World EX2 cards SP1, SP2, SP3, SP4, SP5
Sailor Moon S Rooted-hair capsule figures (Supermoon, Chibimoon, Pluto, Neptune, Uranus)
Eternal Sailor Moon Mini collection doll
Sailor Mercury Pachi Pachi Cute figure boxed
Bandai Sailor Mercury Beauty Change doll (no box is fine but I want the Extra outfit)
Sailormoon World Bottlecap figures Mercury original pose, Mercury special
Sailor Moon S Suki-Suki Ami Mizuno doll
Sailor Moon S Mercury Excellent model doll boxed
Sailor Moon Supers Team Mercury doll
Sailor Moon Supers Talking Mercury doll
Sailor Stars Super Sailor Mercury Beauty Change doll (no box is fine but I want the extra outfit)
